author: raghushantha
body:
PackageManagement is unable to load PS Metaprovider. This provider enables PackageManagement to load providers written as PS Modules such as PowerShellGet provider.

I repro'd this on Ubuntu14.04. @quoctruong will update if he is seeing this on other platforms as well
title: [PackageManagement] PowerShell metaprovider does not work on CorePowerShell
